name: The Run (itch) (NineSly)
description:
Simple text game in cyberpunk genre. 

Game without music. I reccomend this playlist to play (turn off shuffle) - https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1iU1hxyfSRCL7djMxpmAwh?si=acB_IUOmQ1KZVL5PagdJ...

Play in browser PC/Laptop, not on mobile.

Single playthrough time: ~15 min
